EnemyInfo.Name: Autrack
EnemyInfo.Description: Mechanical enemy that raises it's head if Samus is near by and fires.

Property.Name: Laser speed
Property.Description: Fast lasers like the MB version, or slow ones like the (blocking) pirate version.

Property.Name: X activation radius
Property.Description: Pixels from the center of the enemy to detect Samus in and start firing.
